scripts.all:reinstall: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run all:install
scripts.adr:create: echo "What is the title?"; read title; adr new "$title"
scripts.adr:change-status: echo "Decision number?:"; read decision; adr status $decision
scripts.rebuild:dev: npm run clean:build-cache && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development lerna watch -- lerna run build --stream --scope \$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME
scripts.start-dev-application: cross-env NODE_ENV=development lerna run dev:main,dev:renderer,dev-run --stream --scope open-lens
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run build:dev:watch
scripts.mkdocs:serve-local: docker build -t mkdocs-serve-local:latest mkdocs/ && docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs mkdocs-serve-local:latest
scripts.mkdocs:verify: docker build -t mkdocs-serve-local:latest mkdocs/ && docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/docs mkdocs-serve-local:latest build --strict
